code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootReducer from'./reducers';import rootSaga from'./sagas';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware)));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
